definition: to execute by firing squad/same as 槍斃|枪毙
Qin Hui (1090-1155 AD), Song Dynasty official said to have betrayed General Yue Fei 岳飛|岳飞[Yue4 Fei1]
an execution/to put sb to death
unfettered and beyond the law (idiom); evading retribution/getting away with it (e.g. crimes)/still at large

to banish (to an army post, as a punishment)
to uphold virtue and condemn evil (idiom)
